statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 15 \\ -5 \\ 20 \\ 0 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -17 \\ -13 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
